column2: Please respond to me as soon as possible with your comments, and please pass it on to anyone else who needs to see it
Here is my stab at the talking points to be sent in along with the pricing info they requested for the California markets
I will be out of the office on Thursday.  I will talk to you on Friday.
Attached please find the spreadsheet containing the above referenced information.
I received the drawings.  They look good at first glance.  I will look at them in depth this weekend.
Does this file have a timeline for the investment dollars?  I just want to get a feel for when you will start needing money.
I looked over the plan.  It looks fine.
Do I need to give you the names of our operations group?  Let me know if there is anything else you need.
I will be relocating effective December 4th.  Can you have me set up with all the required equipment including, PC, Telephone, and cell phone.
Just a note to check in.  Are there any new developments?
Here is your hotel itinerary for Monday night.
As noted in my  last e-mail, the expansion project in Colorado had the incorrect start date.
Your attachment is not opening on my computer.  Can you put the info in Word instead?
Please excuse the delay in getting these resumes to you.  Larry did not have his prepared and then I forgot to send them.
I'll try to get a status report to you latter today.
can you fill it in yourself? I will sign it.
Is your understanding that the West desk will receive origination each month based on the schedule below.
Thank you for the update.  The need is still great for this disk space.
I spoke to Jeff.  He said he would not pay anything. I am waiting for John to be in a good mood to ask.
Thanks so much for pulling together the November information and getting it to us with so much detail well before our deadline
